summary: In this context, 2-methylbuta-1,3-diene, commonly known as isoprene, is mentioned alongside sesquiterpenes as part of a study measuring volatile organic compounds (VOCs) emitted from plant canopies. While both isoprene and sesquiterpenes are types of terpenes, the context does not elaborate on their specific interactions or functional relationships, indicating a general association rather than a detailed connection.
